body:
After receiving a complaint from the Recording Industry Association of America, GitHub blocked the repository and all mirrors of the **youtube-dl** project - a command line tool for downloading audio and video from YouTube and other sources.

[Blocked repo](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl/releases/download/2020.09.20/youtube-dl)

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about [Notabug](https://notabug.org/) - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative. 

[2020-10-23-RIAA.md Github page](https://github.com/github/dmca/blob/master/2020/10/2020-10-23-RIAA.md)
body_html:

Blocked repo

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about Notabug - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative.

body:
Unless youtube-dl has stolen copyrighted code, DMCA isn't relevant. In that case using DMCA to take down youtube-dl is perjury and is a crime.
Platforms that aren't totally cucked can follow the DMCA counter notice process and keep the content on the service.

parent.body:
Unless youtube-dl has stolen copyrighted code, DMCA isn't relevant. In that case using DMCA to take down youtube-dl is perjury and is a crime.
Platforms that aren't totally cucked can follow the DMCA counter notice process and keep the content on the service.

post.body:
After receiving a complaint from the Recording Industry Association of America, GitHub blocked the repository and all mirrors of the **youtube-dl** project - a command line tool for downloading audio and video from YouTube and other sources.

[Blocked repo](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl/releases/download/2020.09.20/youtube-dl)

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about [Notabug](https://notabug.org/) - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative. 

[2020-10-23-RIAA.md Github page](https://github.com/github/dmca/blob/master/2020/10/2020-10-23-RIAA.md)
post.body_html:
After receiving a complaint from the Recording Industry Association of America, GitHub blocked the repository and all mirrors of the youtube-dl project - a command line tool for downloading audio and video from YouTube and other sources.

Blocked repo

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about Notabug - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative.

2020-10-23-RIAA.md Github page
post.title: Github bans youtube-dl project

body:
Here is something that drives me crazy...  

Most likely, this was available and people used it... there was no problem because it wasn't being WIDELY used.

THEN... it becomes popular, through word of mouth and it gets attention.

THEN, faggots from corporate ban it or advertisers find a way to circumvent it.

This happens with all good things.

There are still some good products out there for downloading YT and there are still great products for blocking ads.

But i'll be fucked if i'm gonna go and advertise it for others.  Because then it gets fucked over.

Here is a great example.

[Blocked repo](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl/releases/download/2020.09.20/youtube-dl)

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about [Notabug](https://notabug.org/) - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative. 

[2020-10-23-RIAA.md Github page](https://github.com/github/dmca/blob/master/2020/10/2020-10-23-RIAA.md)
post.body_html:
After receiving a complaint from the Recording Industry Association of America, GitHub blocked the repository and all mirrors of the youtube-dl project - a command line tool for downloading audio and video from YouTube and other sources.

Blocked repo

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about Notabug - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative.

Unless youtube-dl has stolen copyrighted code, DMCA isn't relevant. In that case using DMCA to take down youtube-dl is perjury and is a crime.
Platforms that aren't totally cucked can follow the DMCA counter notice process and keep the content on the service.

post.body:
After receiving a complaint from the Recording Industry Association of America, GitHub blocked the repository and all mirrors of the **youtube-dl** project - a command line tool for downloading audio and video from YouTube and other sources.

[Blocked repo](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl/releases/download/2020.09.20/youtube-dl)

It is a perfect moment to spread the word about [Notabug](https://notabug.org/) - an ethical, free and opensource Github alternative. 

[2020-10-23-RIAA.md Github page](https://github.com/github/dmca/blob/master/2020/10/2020-10-23-RIAA.md)
